QuestData.Title: Imperial Qiraji Regalia
QuestData.Description: Arygos theorizes that the element which is born of conflicts between the Old Gods and their minions is also extremely deadly to them under the right conditions. I speak of Elementium, mortal.$B$BFind and bring me Imperial Qiraji Regalia and the toxic element and I shall infuse weapons of great power.
QuestData.LogDescription: Merithra of the Dream in the Temple of Ahn'Qiraj will create Elementium Infused Armaments for you should you bring her Imperial Qiraji Regalia and 3 Elementium Ingots.
QuestData.CompletionText: You will strike them down and free us of these bonds.
QuestData.RewardText: Use the item well, $N. Let them feel the pain that they so dearly wish to inflict upon others.
